BakeryContent.BakedGoodDescription: Bridal Showers are hosted before a bride-to-be's big wedding day! It's a gathering with the bride's loved one and her bridemaids where it can be celebrated over brunch, cocktails, a dinner party and more. To celebrate their special day, we give several cake options from a regular buttercream cake or fondant. You have the selection from choosing an 8inch double layer cake, 2 tired or 3 tiered cake.

BakeryContent.BakedGoodFlavors: Assortment of Stawberry, Kiwi and Blackberries or one fruit
BakeryContent.BakedGoodDescription: Father's/Mother's Day is a day to honor your parent, grandparent, step parent or one that raised you as their own son or daughter. It's a day to influence all the parents in society and appreciate their well being and care of their loved one. Celebrate this day with a cake to brighten up and make the day more special! We offer regular butter cream or a fondant cake on an 8inch single or double layer cake.
